import React, { useState } from 'react' import Img from "../img/image.png" import Attach from "../img/attachment.png" import { AuthContext } from '../context/AuthContext' import { ChatContext } from '../context/ChatContext' const input = () => { const[text,setText]=useState[""] const[img,setImg]=useState[null] const {currentUser}=useContext(AuthContext) const {data}=useContext(ChatContext) return (
) } export default input
